officialTitle: TARGIT R: TARGeted Intraoperative radioTherapy (TARGIT) Registry Database
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Local tumour control (defined as no recurrent tumour in the ipsilateral breast)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Recommended treatment by MDT
* Consent has been obtained to have patient data to be collected

Exclusion Criteria:

* Pregnancy (females who have a positive pregnancy test prior to surgery)
* Under 18 years of age
